column1: 2.  Recipients are as at the second Thursday of the month.
3.  Components may not sum to total due to (i) independent rounding (ii) exclusion of unknown and other small categories.

5.  Figures are rounded to the nearest 10.
6. Care should be taken when using the housing type breakdown for Westminster as there are significantly higher proportions of HB claimants with a missing housing type than in other areas
